title: New Darius FeedBack
body:
TLDR: Darius is more useless than before they should keep the old darius with a bit of changes that useful for him.

New Darius is absolutely useless. Yeah i know that darius is a juggernauts he should be person endure damage but his kits isnt make him a good tank or a fighter. He easily counter with melee or range

Q = have decent damage, charge for absolutely nothing? is it for people to dodge easily? Heal only if hit champions... useless before u finish charge ur Q u already around 50% even u use ur E + W 
W = No more reduce CD on this ability and reduce MS and less damage... so rito doesn't want him to do damage? just a meatshield? that no fun...
E = More slow... did rito forget that MS reduction doesn't stack? and a pull that really short u need to be in front of the enemy to pull them back. Before you pull them you either have to flash in and  E or run to them hoping they are dumb and not move back or attack u
R = 5 stacks of passive needed to get max damage... yeah forget getting 5 stacks of passive if u couldn't do anything auto attack nope cant even get close try using E too short to reach the enemy. Use E+W+Q combo too slow 90% slow for 1 sec does nothing in 1 v 1 or 5 v 5."BOO minion are terrified of me BOOO"... Come on rito this just useless. The good thing is that using 0 mana at lvl 16 and it reset before lvl 16 just dream that your team is good and able to win their lane till late so u can be "useful".

This is just my opinion of him and i would like to see him get a bit of buff in the future so he will be a fun champion to play again. BTW i suck at english so my grammar is very terrible. But i just gotta make this feedback because how horrible he is now

replies.body: Totally agree with OP, Darius feels clunky and slow now, really don't like his q windup, it is way to visible.
have you all seen new {{item:3083}} so op
Have you guys seen the new mord and skarner reworks though? So fking scary late game... A 9-7 mord could 1v3, maybe even 1v4... It's stupidly OP

They will buff and nerf accordingly next patch. Right now I think they demolished his laning for teamfight power which isn't nice. The whole point of Darius was lane bully. I feel like they've lost what he was all about

Darius's new attack speed is the biggest nerf i have ever witnessed in my entire life in playing lol since season 1.

He has 0.66 attack speed basically all game, tried top twice with him, never ended up getting 5 stacks on a champ that was melee, forget about range harass champions.

in which world is darius more useful than garen? Garens late game literally shits on darius's, tank wise, damage wise by FAR and actual has use with his silence and ult.

Yeah darius has a ult but he will never get it off with his new attack speed.
